main event: A military personnel observed a single object at Camp Drum, New York, on September 5, 1956.
interesting points: The object was described as dime-sized and pink turning to white,The object faded out gradually and then reappeared,The report concludes that the object was probably Mars,The sighting lasted approximately 1 hour and 54 minutes,The observation was made using binoculars.
sighted object: one dime-sized object that was pink turning to white
witness description: Ronald R. Schalck, SFC Army, 1229 SVR SQD Unit Post, Aviation Corps.
